original_text: Jesus knew what they were talking about. So he said to them, ‘You should not be arguing about the bread. You still do not understand my teaching. You seem unable to learn.
korean_text: 예수께서 아시고 이르시되 너희가 어찌 떡이 없음으로 수군거리느냐 아직도 알지 못하며 깨닫지 못하느냐 너희 마음이 둔하냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus knew what they were talking about
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 무엇을 이야기하고 있는지 알고 계셨다

sentences.original_text: You should not be arguing about the bread
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 빵 때문에 다투어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: You still do not understand my teaching
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 아직 내 가르침을 이해하지 못한다
